categories: Category:Military units and formations of the Imperial Army (Sith Empire)

nodes.text: The Imperial sniper corps was a unit within the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire following its return. It was specifically designed to train snipers for the Sith Empire with the purpose of using them in the various situations. Members of this elite unit wore better camouflaged armor and carried sniper rifles. The training given to these troopers teaches patience and precision. Vrath Xizor once belonged to it.
